medical_history.chief_complaint: Constant right lower quadrant abdominal pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began suddenly this morning at 7:30 am, rated as 'more than 10' out of 10 in intensity. The patient initially thought it was gas and took Pepto Bismol and Aleve without relief. He has been able to keep food and liquids down but has a decreased appetite. He denies any trauma to the area, fever, chills, or gastrointestinal changes.
